abilities.description: Allows user to transform into a mole hybrid or full mole form
Enables the user to move through the ground as if swimming in a pool
User can create interconnected tunnel networks for movement and allies
Burrowing attack that drags opponents through walls
Combined attack with Mr. 4 using the tunnel system

weaknesses.weakness: All created tunnels are interconnected, making large-scale explosions devastating to both user and allies
Opponents can exploit tunnel systems for their own advantage

keyMoments.title: Mogu Mogu Impact on Usopp
keyMoments.description: Miss Merry Christmas uses Mogu Mogu Impact to drag Usopp through a wall, severely injuring him.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the offensive power of the Mogu Mogu no Mi in combat.

keyMoments.title: User Defeated
keyMoments.description: Miss Merry Christmas is defeated when Mr. 4 accidentally hits her with his bat while blinded by Usopp's smoke.
keyMoments.significance: Shows how the fruit's tunnel system can be exploited by clever opponents.

name.japanese: イヌイヌの実 モデル「ダックスフンド」
name.romanized: Inu Inu no Mi, Moderu: Dakkusufundo

abilities.description: Allows the gun Lassoo to transform into a living dachshund
Can fire explosive baseballs on its own without manual triggering
Grants life and consciousness to the inanimate gun

weaknesses.weakness: Dachshunds are a weak and sickly dog species, causing Lassoo to suffer from constant illness and frequent sneezing

keyMoments.title: Lassoo Defeated
keyMoments.description: Lassoo is knocked out along with Mr. 4 by Usopp's Hissatsu Uso-Cho Hammer Suisei.
keyMoments.significance: First time a weapon that has eaten a Devil Fruit is defeated in combat.

specialNotes.note: This is the first Devil Fruit shown to be consumed by an inanimate object through Vegapunk's process

abilities.description: User can transform into any person they have touched, copying their face and body perfectly
Rapid cycling through multiple copied faces to disorient opponents
Complete physical transformation including voice and mannerisms

weaknesses.weakness: Cannot use Okama Kenpo while impersonating others - must revert to original form to perform combat techniques

keyMoments.title: Mane Mane Montage Revealed
keyMoments.description: Mr. 2 demonstrates rapid transformation cycling, showing the versatility of the Mane Mane no Mi.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases advanced use of the Devil Fruit beyond simple one-to-one impersonation.

keyMoments.title: Exploits Sanji's Weakness
keyMoments.description: Mr. 2 transforms into Nami to exploit Sanji's inability to fight women.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the tactical and psychological applications of the Mane Mane no Mi in combat.

specialNotes.note: User must touch someone's face with their right hand to copy their appearance permanently
Weakness revealed: Cannot use martial arts techniques while transformed

abilities.description: A transformation that enhances Chopper's horns, making them larger and stronger for combat and utility purposes

keyMoments.title: Horn Point Revealed
keyMoments.description: Chopper unveils his Horn Point transformation for the first time, using it strategically in battle.
keyMoments.significance: Expands Chopper's known transformation repertoire, showing his growing mastery of the Hito Hito no Mi.

keyMoments.title: Horn Point Used as Slingshot
keyMoments.description: Chopper's Horn Point is used creatively as a giant slingshot for Usopp's hammer attack.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates versatile applications of Devil Fruit powers beyond straightforward combat.
